Posted By: Kryptnyt (3/20/2011 6:39:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: There's no reason this ability should cost three mana in addition to the three sacrifices. It makes the heralds even more bad than they already were. I have [Sphinx Sovereign](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx Sovereign) in my Esper deck and I can easily get it out without the herald. I have two [Sphinx Summoner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx Summoner)s to search for it, and two [Master Transmuter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Master Transmuter)s to cheat it out. If I don't get any of those I can still hard-cast it with the help of [Etherium Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etherium Sculptor) and [Vedalken Engineer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vedalken Engineer). The herald is far from the easiest way to get the Sovereign out.
posts.html:
There's no reason this ability should cost three mana in addition to the three sacrifices. It makes the heralds even more bad than they already were. I have Sphinx Sovereign in my Esper deck and I can easily get it out without the herald. I have two Sphinx Summoners to search for it, and two Master Transmuters to cheat it out. If I don't get any of those I can still hard-cast it with the help of Etherium Sculptor and Vedalken Engineer. The herald is far from the easiest way to get the Sovereign out.

posts.post_content:
Never understood what the point of a "combo" this obvious, boring, and weak was.   
  
Would be much cooler if it read: "U, T, Sacrifice a white creature, black creature, and a blue creature: Put a 6/6 Sphinx Token with Flying into play." You may not still get Sphinx Sovereign, but you do get a pretty decent beater out, and a little bit cheaper, too. I'd rather have that than this giant pile of card disadvantage for a Sphinx that really doesn't deserve it.
posts.html:

You may not still get Sphinx Sovereign, but you do get a pretty decent beater out, and a little bit cheaper, too. I'd rather have that than this giant pile of card disadvantage for a Sphinx that really doesn't deserve it.
